page.title: 13KINGSNORTH VILLAGE
page.content:
{ This village lies on a small hill, topped by the church. It is at a crossroad with the A2070.
At the crossroad used to be the village Smithy, which has now transferred its skills to the motor trade; also at the crossroad is the village Public House.
Ribbon development has taken place along the main road leading to Ashford, mainly bungalows, and in the southerly direction more bungalows on the Shipley Hill. Surrounding the village are fields and odd patches of woodland. The Cricket Club makes use of a field near the Church and is well supported.
